title: Maggie Kuhn: wrinkled radical
creator_credit: Howard Weinberg and WNET (Television station : New York, N.Y.)
brief_description: Maggie Kuhn who helped establish the Gray Panter Movement in America discusses aspects of old age, human sexuality and medical care. Interviewed by Studs Terkel.
